Nighlight:

"Rodimus???? RODIMUS!!!!"

the unfinished mesagge and the sound=
 of the battle worried her
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Richard =
Allen 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, October 30, 2007 12:4=
9 PM
  Subject: Re: THE MINIONS OF UNICRON HAVE COME!


  ::Rodimus Prime/K=
up::

  Rodimus continued to reply to his wife over the commlink.

  Rodimu=
s: We're ok out here but the city is under siege by a large Minion force...=


  Kup: Move. Now!

  Kup grabs Rodimus and takes them both over the raili=
ng into the water below. They start to swim as Cyclonus' missile eradicate =
the balcony above.

  Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

    =
OOC: If I have forgotten anyone PLEASE let me know. Also I have to
    assu=
me that Doc is firing at the sweeps, which btw look almost
    identical to=
 Scourge, since Doc is some distance from Scourge and
    cannot see him fr=
om his vantage point. If that is incorrect please let
    me know and I wil=
l make changes.

    BIC:

    In the air sweeps continue to rain firepower=
 on city below. In some
    places people are continuing to be corralled in=
to larger building
    structures, while in other places the sweeps fire wi=
th seeming abandon.
    With a frightening intelligence a few 'wings' of sw=
eeps break off and
    begin to target the anti-aircraft batteries, disinte=
gration beams
    cutting through skies like energized ginsue knives. 

   =
 Meanwhile in the air a short distance from the maximal base
    Ravenchief=
's volley of missiles flew at Cyclonus, only to be evaded by
    the craft.=
 Boosters flared as Cyclonus swung to one side, allowing the
    missiles t=
o fly past him. With a short burst of cannon fire he blew
    them out of t=
he sky, and then he continued on. 

    However Ravenchief was not to be le=
ft without company, Scourge banked
    around also, his sweep craft uniquel=
y agile and swift. As he came
    around a red targeting laser blared out '=
painting' Ravenchief, "You are
    a fool to stand against us Maximal! You =
only have termination to look
    forward to!" Scourge opened up with his a=
cid cannons!

    On the shoreline the sweeps lost interest in searching fo=
r Trelos,
    perhaps they lost his scent, so turned their attention to Doc=
. 

    As Doc's blast lanced out, catching one sweep in the wing casing it=
 to
    smoke a little. Meanwhile the unmistakable smell of acid began fill=
ing
    the air as red targeting beams danced around Doc's position and two=

    other sweeps began to open fire on Doc.

    On the railing above Doc'=
s position, Kup managed to hit one of the
    sweeps but the other - either=
 it was more agile or more lucky - but it
    managed to avoid him. Even as=
 that happened several other sweeps swung
    into position ready to open f=
ire as targeting beams lanced out again,
    but just suddenly they broke p=
osition! 

    The reason for this became more evident as the now open air =
rippled and
    twin missiles approached Kup and Rodimus' positions, fire a=
nd wind
    trailing behind them like a vortex. As the missiles approached =
it was
    obvious that they were the same type of missiles fired from Cycl=
onus
    earlier and that these missiles were going to do quite a bit of da=
mage!

    At the Maximal base, sweeps continued to pound on it in an attem=
pt to
    break its shield defenses!

    OOC: Don't forget Nightstrike and=
 Darkfate were commanded by Cyclonus
    to either take the Maximal base or=
 Destroy it with the help of the
    sweeps left behind.
